ccre.ctrl

Interface IDispatchJoystick

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ISimpleJoystick

    public interface IDispatchJoystick
extends ISimpleJoystick
    A joystick that provides asynchronous triggers for its inputs, instead of pollable values.
    See Also:
    ISimpleJoystick

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      FloatInput getAxisSource(int axis)
      Get a FloatInput that represents the given axis.
      EventSource getButtonSource(int id)
      Get an EventSource that will be fired when the given button is pressed.

      • Methods inherited from interface ccre.ctrl.ISimpleJoystick

        getAxisChannel, getButtonChannel, getXChannel, getYChannel

    • Method Detail

      • getButtonSource

        EventSource getButtonSource(int id)
        Get an EventSource that will be fired when the given button is pressed.
        Parameters:
        id - the button ID.
        Returns:
        the EventSource representing the button being pressed.

        Get a FloatInput that represents the given axis.
